info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 6:09PM PDT until August 10 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHEASTERN NYE AND WEST CENTRAL CLARK COUNTIES... At 609 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain have ended across the warned area. However, flash flooding from runoff is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pahrump and Sandy Valley. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
